page.title: 14FIRBECK HOME WATCH SCHEME
page.content: Years ago people got worried because they had a lot of robberies.So they phoned the police man and he phoned the station in{Maltby}and they organisd a meeting.Five policemen came.So they thought of having a Home Watch Scheme.So all the people decided to do that.They were all divided into different parts of{Firbeck.}There were 7 parts of the village.Mrs Stocks is a member of the scheme and also she is a co_ordinator.Most of the people who live in Firbeck are at work in the day so people take it in turns to watch people's houses.One time a bird hit a burglar alarm and it went off. There are 14 co-ordinators in the scheme. They have had no burglaries since the scheme started.
